requirements.original_text: The system should allow users to register, log in, and manage their profiles.
Admins must be able to manage user permissions and system configurations.
The system must support 1000 concurrent users with 99.9% uptime.

introduction.purpose: Provide a specification for a user management system that supports account creation, authentication, and administration.
introduction.scope: Covers user registration, login, profile management, and administrator controls.
introduction.overview: The system enables end users to create accounts and manage profiles, while administrators configure permissions and system settings.

overall_description.product_perspective: Standalone web application integrated with an authentication provider.

requirements.original_text: The application should provide product browsing, search, and checkout.
Payments must be processed securely with receipts emailed to customers.
Admins can add, edit, and remove products from the catalog.

introduction.purpose: Define requirements for an e-commerce platform supporting shopping and payment.
introduction.scope: Includes catalog browsing, search, cart, checkout, and admin catalog management.
introduction.overview: End users can discover products and make purchases; administrators maintain the product catalog.

overall_description.product_perspective: Web application using external payment gateway.

requirements.original_text: The system should allow users to register.
